segments.text: May I have a menu , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could you tell me how this thing is cooked ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Lobster ? It is steamed and served with our special sauce .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure . It is a most popular dish .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I think I will try some lobster , and give me some green salad together .
segments.speaker: S1
